replies.body:
A great person to be around; you've really sprung up as a member of the staff team and you've become a much better player. You deserve a better team so good luck with that.

Barely a paragraph but oh well

reply_to.body: Paragraph on me?
reply_to.body_tagged: Paragraph on me?

replies.body:
Honestly I found you extremely annoying when you played for Qrysis. Always screaming in chat and following behind everyone else. Since then you've calmed down and become a member of the community. Good luck with any other teams you're thinking of joining because you've become a much better player as well.

Although BoE was soooooo much better than RtV, I'd like T4 to still have much better organisation. It would also be nice to have teams that didn't no show sign up so we'd actually be able to play matches. I remember in the group stage of BoE I was literally begging Necro to not no show because we hadn't played a game all day and were extremely bored.

replies.body:
I'm running the fitness gram pacer test, want to know what it is? Ok.


The FitnessGram™ Pacer Test is a multistage aerobic capacity test that progressively gets more difficult as it continues. The 20 meter pacer test will begin in 30 seconds. Line up at the start. The running speed starts slowly, but gets faster each minute after you hear this signal. [beep] A single lap should be completed each time you hear this sound. [ding] Remember to run in a straight line, and run as long as possible. The second time you fail to complete a lap before the sound, your test is over. The test will begin on the word start. On your mark, get ready, start.
replies.body_tagged:
I'm running the fitness gram pacer test, want to know what it is? Ok.


The FitnessGram™ Pacer Test is a multistage aerobic capacity test that progressively gets more difficult as it continues. The 20 meter pacer test will begin in 30 seconds. Line up at the start. The running speed starts slowly, but gets faster each minute after you hear this signal. [beep] A single lap should be completed each time you hear this sound. [ding] Remember to run in a straight line, and run as long as possible. The second time you fail to complete a lap before the sound, your test is over. The test will begin on the word start. On your mark, get ready, start.

Also I want your bean bridge back

replies.body:
Hustlenomics or Apollo if we really improve and sort out a good roster. CameL have a shot as well.

Probably lego because he's consistent.

As a player I still don't have much respect for you after you cheated a couple of times in the past. However you're still good and can still beat me in pot sooo... As a person we've had our ups and downs but somehow we're actually ok with eachother. Still get pissed off at you for banning me that one time but oh well.

reply_to.body: Opinions on me L Spookeeyyyy?
reply_to.body_tagged: Opinions on me L Spookeeyyyy?

replies.body:
Used to think you were a complete asshole but since you've come back we'be been somewhat friends. Try to stay away from becoming extremely toxic like the last time you were banned and I'm sure you'll work your way back into the community because you're pretty chill now. 

I respect you for putting together a team from such a small community who scrims "10 times a day". You do have a lot of potential with the very good roster you currently have but sometimes you guys can be quite cocky with your 'scrim record' which makes other teams really want to beat you.

Loved being in the team before SOC because we were so active and all got along really well. After the tourney we were all kinda depressed and it was 2-3 weeks before we started scrimming again. That's when Banjo kicked me and I basically lost all respect for the team. I still love the old grim players who are on the roster but I don't like how wrap has basically immigrated into the team along with other 'higher' and more 'top-tier' players. I would like to see them do well in the last tourney but then again it would be pretty funny (no offence) if they didn't because half the old grim members were kicked or left and it's a completely new team now. Might as well call it Opus :/

Well... I'd like to say I'm pretty good player but I'm only 1200 on kohi and I somehow always lose loads of build matches on arena. When it comes to Avicus and OCN I can still somehow beat the much better players and idek how. I also like to think that I'm fairly well known among the Avicus community and that I'm a nice person to be around in ts but I really don't know :p
replies.body_tagged:
Used to think you were a complete asshole but since you've come back we'be been somewhat friends. Try to stay away from becoming extremely toxic like the last time you were banned and I'm sure you'll work your way back into the community because you're pretty chill now. 

I respect you for putting together a team from such a small community who scrims "10 times a day". You do have a lot of potential with the very good roster you currently have but sometimes you guys can be quite cocky with your 'scrim record' which makes other teams really want to beat you.

Loved being in the team before SOC because we were so active and all got along really well. After the tourney we were all kinda depressed and it was 2-3 weeks before we started scrimming again. That's when Banjo kicked me and I basically lost all respect for the team. I still love the old grim players who are on the roster but I don't like how wrap has basically immigrated into the team along with other 'higher' and more 'top-tier' players. I would like to see them do well in the last tourney but then again it would be pretty funny (no offence) if they didn't because half the old grim members were kicked or left and it's a completely new team now. Might as well call it Opus :/

Well... I'd like to say I'm pretty good player but I'm only 1200 on kohi and I somehow always lose loads of build matches on arena. When it comes to Avicus and OCN I can still somehow beat the much better players and idek how. I also like to think that I'm fairly well known among the Avicus community and that I'm a nice person to be around in ts but I really don't know :p
